posts.post_content:
Trying to pick up at least one more T205 I need to finish my Red Sox team set. The ones I need are

Cicotte
Karger 
Kleinow
Wagner

They can be graded or raw. I am on a budget, so lower grade is fine. Condition-wise, I don’t care much about corner or edges, but would like to avoid significant paper loss, creasing, or altered cards. 

Thanks!
